MediaDevicesSelectAudioOutput.summary: The selectAudioOutput() method of the interface prompts the user to select an audio output device, such as a speaker or headset. If the user selects a device, the method grants user permission to use the selected device as an audio output sink.

remarks.para: Following selection, if the device is available it can be enumerated using and set as the audio output sink using .
On success, the returned {{jsxref("Promise")}} is resolved with a describing the selected device.

-
-
-WebRTC - the introductory page to the API

MediaDevicesSelectAudioOutput.returns: A {{ jsxref("Promise") }} that is fulfilled with a object that describes the audio output device selected by the user.
